H0.text: What colour is Lady Penelope’s car in the television puppet series ‘Thunderbirds’. Red

H1.text: What colour is Lady Penelope’s car in the television puppet series ‘Thunderbirds’. Silver

H2.text: What colour is Lady Penelope’s car in the television puppet series ‘Thunderbirds’. Black

H3.text: What colour is Lady Penelope’s car in the television puppet series ‘Thunderbirds’. Pink

A4.text: FAB 1 is a six-wheeled Rolls-Royce pink motor car

A5.text: Lady Penelope also owns several pink Ford cars, at least one of which is named 'FAB 8'
